question: Which of the following Asian countries had bloodless coup in 1960?
explanation:
The 1960 coup was the first bloodless coup. It took place in Turkey. It happened at a time when tensions between the government and the opposition were high and the ruling Democratic Party led by Prime Minister Menderes was losing power.
On May 3, 1960, the commander of the land forces, demanded political reforms and resigned when his demands were refused. On May 27 the army acted. An almost bloodless coup was carried out by officers and cadets from the Istanbul and Ankara war colleges.
